response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that this item holds a significant importance to me, valued at $15,000. Considering its worth to you and my attachment to it, I propose a fair offer of $12,000 for the product. This price not only ensures a reasonable profit for me but also provides you with an opportunity to acquire something of great value at a competitive price. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you require further discussion.", "product_price": 12000}
